channel.title: Homes on Martin Asenov
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Martin Asenov

item.description: Biography Currently, I am a PhD student at the University of Edinburgh, working on active sensing with UAV, in collaboration with Heriot-Watt University and the Defence Science and Technology Laboratory. I am holding a Master by Research in Robotics and Autonumous Systems, a joint program between The University of Edinburgh and Heriot-Watt University. I also hold a BSc in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Science from the University of Edinburgh. During my undergraduate studies I was also able to go to the Uninversity of California, Irvine for a year-long exchange.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I worked as tutor at Avid Academy, where I was preparing students for AIME and AMC math competitions. I also tutored the Advanced Object Orientated classes at The University of Edinburgh in my final year as undergraduate student.
